27 #ifndef _ShaderMaterialSerializerListener_
28 #define _ShaderMaterialSerializerListener_
29 
30 #include "OgreShaderPrerequisites.h"

32 #include "OgreShaderGenerator.h"
33 
34 namespace Ogre {
35 namespace RTShader {
36 
47 class _OgreRTSSExport SGMaterialSerializerListener : public MaterialSerializer::Listener, public RTShaderSystemAlloc
48 {
49 
50 // Interface.
51 public:
52 
56  virtual void materialEventRaised(MaterialSerializer* ser,
57  MaterialSerializer::SerializeEvent event, bool& skip, const Material* mat);
58 
62  virtual void techniqueEventRaised(MaterialSerializer* ser,
63  MaterialSerializer::SerializeEvent event, bool& skip, const Technique* tech);
64 
68  virtual void passEventRaised(MaterialSerializer* ser,
69  MaterialSerializer::SerializeEvent event, bool& skip, const Pass* tech);
70 
74  virtual void textureUnitStateEventRaised(MaterialSerializer* ser,
75  MaterialSerializer::SerializeEvent event, bool& skip, const TextureUnitState* textureUnit);
76 
77 // Types.
78 protected:
79  typedef vector<ShaderGenerator::SGPass*>::type SGPassList;
80  typedef SGPassList::iterator SGPassListIterator;
81  typedef SGPassList::const_iterator SGPassListConstIterator;
82 
83 // Protected methods.
84 protected:
86  SGMaterialSerializerListener();
87  ~SGMaterialSerializerListener();
88 
90  void createSGPassList(Material* mat, SGPassList& passList);
91 
93  ShaderGenerator::SGPass* getShaderGeneratedPass (const Pass* srcPass);
94 
95 
96 // Attributes.
97 protected:
98  // The current source material that is being written.
99  Material* mSourceMaterial;
100  // List of SGPass instances composing this material.
101  SGPassList mSGPassList;
102 
103 
104 private:

106 };
